page.wifisetup:
Please enter the Robot Link Code.
You will find it on the robot display under: Wifi Setup / Register

communication.wait_robot: Robot wakes up in about __wakeUp__ seconds.

communication.wakeup_robot: Robot wakes up in about __wakeUp__ seconds.

page.information:
We wish to keep you informed about new updates, product related issues and new products.
We strive to keep your privacy safe. You agree that Vorwerk International Strecker & Co. is allowed to store your private data in compliance with the EU privacy policy. We do not share your data with companies outside the Vorwerk group.
To unsubscribe, please see bottom of email.
page.title: Please tell us, if you would like to subscribe for news and updates regarding your VR-200.
page.edit_done_message: The user account has been updated successfully

page.robot_management_desc: Edit this robot or switch to another.

page.id_accepted:
Your Registration ID was accepted!

If you want, you can now personalize your robot's name. You can always rename your robot's name in the settings menu.

page.title:
Welcome to the registration.
We need some information to continue

A confirmation mail was sent to
__email__

Please confirm your account within 48 hours.
After confirmation you can login and connect to your robot.

You have no robots registered yet.
Please add your new robot by selecting +.
